title: Low FPS
body: I've been playing League for about 3 years now and my fps has always been moderate; from 40-70 (to some people its still low but to me its absolutely fine) But then like a month ago, my fps started becoming absolute crap ranging from 12-24 and I can barely work with it. Is there any way to solve this? What's causing it? Is my graphics card like damaged or something

replies.body: Have you made sure that your Graphics Card is updated? A lot of the times they update them without informing you, but a quick reinstall usually gets them under control. You could also run through our [FPS Guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684)which has many steps to help you locate and alleviate the issue from happening again.
